v.v: Yahweh, it is good for people to thank you
It is good to proclaim every morning that you faithfully love us
accompanied by musicians playing harps that have ten strings
Yahweh, you have caused me to be glad;
Yahweh, the things that you do are great!
There are things that you do that foolish people cannot know about,
They do not understand that although the number of wicked people increases as blades of grass do
But Yahweh, you will be king forever.
Yahweh, your enemies will certainly die,
But you have caused me to be as strong as a wild ox;
I have seen you defeat my enemies,
But righteous people will prosper like palm trees that grow well,
They are like the trees that people plant at the temple of Yahweh in Jerusalem,
Even when righteous people become old, they do many things that please God.
That shows that Yahweh is just;

v: and to sing praise to you who are greater than any other god.
and to sing songs each night that declare that you always do what you have promised to do,
and by the sounds made by a lyre.
I sing joyfully because of what you have done.
But it is difficult to understand all that you think.
things that stupid people cannot understand.
and that those who do what is evil prosper,
and those who do wicked things will be defeated.
you have caused me to be very joyful.
and I have heard those evil men wail while they were being slaughtered.
like the cedar trees that grow in Lebanon.
the trees that are close to the courtyard of the temple of our God.
They remain strong and full of energy like trees that remain full of sap.
he is like a huge rock on which I am safe,
and he never does anything that is wicked.
